juzs.text: Those ne expect meet us dir nur angxel ven us ni seg our Lord (ni tiam kred!) Ja ili committed gross arrogance produkt gross blasphemy
Tag ili seg angxel ne est bon news kulp ili dir Nun ni irreversibly confined
Ni rigard je all works ili done render them null kaj void
dwellers Paradise est far put tag; ili auxd put news
heaven romp apart mas de nub angxel descend multitudes
All sovereignty ke tag aparten al plej Gracious. Por disbelievers gxi est difficult tag
Tag ven when transgressor mord his man en anguish dir Alas Mi wish mi sekv path messenger
Alas ve me Mi wish mi ne pren ke ul amik
Li plumb me for el message gxi ven me Ja diabl lets his human viktim
messenger dir My Lord my popol dezert this Quran
Ni ankaux set kontraux cxiu prophet enemies el kulp Your Lord suffices direkt mastr
Those disbelieved dir ne did Quran ven him all je once Ni released gxi vi gradually en ord fiks gxi your stor! Ni recited gxi specif sequence
Whatever argument ili ven ni proviz vi truth bon kompren
Those forcibly summoned al Infer est mav pozici; ili est farthest dekstr path
Ni don Moses scripture appointed his frat Aaron est his assistant
Ni dir Ir ambaux vi al popol rejected our revelations subsequently ni utterly annihilated rejectors
Similarly when popol Noah disbelieved messengers ni dron them ni set them as sign popol! Ni prepar transgressors painful retribution
Ankaux ‘Aad Thamoud inhabitants Al-Russ many generaci them
Al each da these grup ni liver sufficient ekzempl antaux ni annihilated them
Ili pas community est dusx kun miserable dusx (Sodom). Ili ne seg gxi? Fakt est ili neniam kred en resurrection
When ili seg vi ili cxiam ridiculed vi this 1 chosen DI Est est messenger
Li preskaux diverted us our di ne est ni steadfastly persevered them. Ili vol certainly trov out, when ili seg retribution est efektiv strayers el path
Vi seg unu di hav est his own ego? Vi est his advokat
Vi pens ke plej Do them auxd kompren Ili est just best; ne ili est far mav
Vi ne seg kiel your Lord desegn ombr? Li willed Li far gxi fiks tiam ni desegn sun accordingly
Ni desegn gxi mov slowly
Li est Unu desegn nokt est kovr kaj vi al dorm ripoz. Li far tag resurrection
Li est 1 who send vent bon omens His mercy ni send down cxiel pur akv
Kun gxi ni revive dead land proviz trink our creations! - multitudes de best humans
Ni distribu gxi them exact mezur ke ili pren heed Sed plej popol insist upon disbelieving
Ni willed ni hav send al cxiu community warner
Do ne obe disbelievers strive them this great striving
Li est Unu merges 2 mar; 1 est fresx palatable while ali est salty undrinkable. Kaj Li apart them formidable inviolable barrier (evaporation)
Li est Unu kre el akv human est tiam far him reproduce marriage mating Your Lord est Omnipotent
Ili ankoraux set DI idols ne benefit them nor harm them! Ja disbeliever est enemy his Lord
Ni send vi (Rashad) deliverer bon news tro warner
dir mi ne pet vi any mon. All mi streb est help vi trov dekstr path al your Lord this est ki vi choose
Vi put your fid Unu est Alive - Unu who neniam mort - Lauxd Him glor Him! Li est fully Cognizant de His creatures' pek
Li est Unu kre heavens ter cxio them 6 tag tiam assumed all auxtoritat. Plej Gracious; pet pri Him those nu founded knowledge
When ili told Fal prostrate antaux plej Gracious ili dir Ki est plej Gracious? Shall ni prostrate ki vi advokat? Do gxi nur eg their aversion
Ben est Unu ej constellations en des cxiel, ej gxi lamp lum lun
Li est Unu desegn nokt tag altern sufficient proof those wish sorb heed est appreciative
worshipers plej Gracious est those tread ter gently when ignorant parol al them ili nur utter pac
En privacy nokt ili medit their Lord auxtun prostrate
Ili dir Our Lord sxpar us agondi Infer; its retribution est horrendous
Gxi est mav abode; mav destiny
When ili don ili est nek extravagant nor stingy ili don moderation
Ili neniam implore DI any ali di nor do ili kill anyone - Por DI far life sankt! - Escept justice Nor do ili commit adultery. Those commit these offenses pag
Retribution doubled them Tag Resurrection ili abide therein humiliated
Exempted est those pent kred plumb righteous life! DI transforms their PEK KREDIT. DI est Forgiver Merciful
Those pent plumb righteous life DI redeems them; komplet redemption
Ili ne bor false witness When ili renkont vain talk ili ignor gxi
When reminded de their Lord's revelations ili neniam react them as ili est surd blind
Ili dir Our Lord let our spouses infan est source joy us keep us forefront de des righteous
These est unu ating Paradise dors their steadfastness; ili ricev therein joyous greetings pac
Eternally ili abide therein; ki bel destiny; ki bel abode
Dir Vi ating value my Lord nur tra your worship Vi disbelieve vi incur inevitable consequences
M. (Ta Seg Mim)
These (liter) constitute proofs this clarifying scripture
Vi blame ti ili ne est believers
Ni testament ni send cxiel sign forces their kol bow
Whenever reminder el plej Gracious ven al them est neo ili turn aversion
Ekde ili disbelieved ili incurred consequences their heedlessness
Ili ne seg ter kaj kiel many kinds bel plant ni kresk thereon
This est sufficient proof them plej de them ne est believers
plej assuredly your Lord est Almighty Merciful
Recall your Lord vok Moses Ir transgressing popol
Pharaoh's popol; perhaps ili reform
Li dir My Lord mi tim lest ili disbelieve me
Mi perd my temper My lang lig; send por my frat Aaron
Ankaux ili konsider me fugitive mi tim lest ili kill me
Li ne dir (ili do gxi. Ir My proofs Ni est vi auxskult)
Ir Pharaoh dir ‘Ni est messengers Lord de univers
Let Infan Israel ir
Li dir ni ne raise vi infancy vi spent many jar us
Tiam vi committed krim vi committed vi est ungrateful
Li dir Ja mi did gxi when mi est astray
Tiam mi fled when mi tim vi my Lord dot me kun wisdom far me 1 messengers
Vi fanfaron ti vi did me komplez while enslaving Infan Israel
Pharaoh dir Ki est Lord univers
Li dir Lord de heavens ter cxio them. Vi est nepr pri this
Li dir al those around him vi auxd this
Li dir Your Lord Lord your ancestors
Li dir Your messenger est send al vi est crazy
Li dir Lord de orient okcident cxio them vi kompren
Li dir vi akcept any di me mi jxet vi prison
Li dir Ki mi montr vi io profound
Li dir Tiam produkt gxi vi est truthful
Li tiam jxet his stab whereupon gxi igx profound serpent
Li sorb his man gxi est blank al beholders
Li dir al elders him This est spert magician
Li wants sorb vi your land his magic Ki do vi sugest
Ili dir Respite him his frat send summoners cxiu town
Let them summon cxiu spert magician
magicians gathered appointed temp appointed tag
Popol told Ven 1 all gather together here
Maybe ni sekv magicians ili est winners
When magicians ven ili dir al Pharaoh ni pag ni Do est winners
Li dir Jes ja; vi ecx est me
Moses dir al them Jxet ki vi jxet
Ili jxet their sxnur baston dir Pharaoh's majesty ni est victors
Moses jxet his stab whereupon gxi hirund ki ili fabricated
magicians fal prostrate
Ili dir Ni kred en Lord univers
Lord de Moses Aaron
Li dir Did vi kred him antaux mi don vi permission? Li est your teacher instru vi magic Vi do gxi surely trov out! Mi sever your man fut altern flank. Mi crucify vi all
Ili dir This ne sxangx our decision; our Lord ni return
Ni esper our Lord forgive us our pek especially ke ni est 1 believers
Ni inspir Moses Vojagx My servants vi pursued
Pharaoh send al urb callers
(Proklam) This est small gang
Ili tuj opposing us
all beware da them
Consequently ni deprived them de gxarden printemp
Kaj trezor kaj honorable pozici
Tiam ni far gxi inheritance Infan Israel
Ili pursued them orient
When ambaux parti seg each ali Moses' popol dir Ni kapt
Li ne dir voj My Lord est me Li direkt me
Ni tiam inspir Moses Strik mar your stab whereupon gxi part. Each part est great hill
Ni tiam liver them all
Ni tiel sav Moses all those est him
Ni dron others
This est sufficient proof plej popol ne est believers
plej assuredly your Lord est Almighty Merciful
Narrate al them Abraham's histori
Li dir al his patr his popol Ki this vi est worshipping
Ili dir Ni worship statu; ni est totally devoted al them
Li dir ili auxd vi when vi implore
Ili benefit vi Can harm vi
Ili ne dir ni trov our parents doing this
Li dir Do vi seg these idols vi worship
Vi your ancestors
Mi est them por mi devoted nur Lord univers
Unu kre me direkt me
Unu feeds me akv me
Kaj when mi get sick Li heals me
Unu puts me death tiam brings me dors life
Unu who hopefully forgive my pek Tag Judgment
My Lord grant me wisdom include me kun des righteous
Let ekzempl mi set por des future generaci est bon
Far me 1 inheritors blissful Paradise
Kaj forgive my patr por li ir astray
Ne forsake me Tag Resurrection
Ke est tag when nek mon nor infan help
Nur those ven DI their whole kor (vol sav)
Paradise prezent des righteous
Infer set strayers
Ili pet Kie est idols vi worshipped
beside DI? Ili help vi tuj? Ili help
Ili jxet therein together strayers
all da Satan's soldat
Ili dir as ili feud therein
Per DI ni est far astray
Kiel ni set vi could rang Lord univers
Those misled us est wicked
Nun ni ne hav intercessors
Nor single close amik
Nur ni get another sxanc ni tiam kred
This est bon lecion. Plej popol ne est believers
Your Lord est Almighty Merciful
Popol Noah disbelieved messengers
Their frat Noah dir al them vi ne est righteous
Mi est honest messenger vi
Vi reverence DI obe me
Mi ne pet vi any wage My wage ven el Lord univers
Vi reverence DI obe me
Ili dir Kiel ni kred vi can when mav among us sekv vi
Li dir Kiel mi kon ki ili do did
Their judgment ripoz nur my Lord vi perceive
Mi neniam dismiss believers
Mi est ne plur than clarifying warner
Ili dir vi refrain O Noah vi sxton
Li dir My Lord my popol disbelieved me
Grant me victory them liver me my kompani believers
Ni liver him those akompan him loaded ark
Tiam ni dron others
This est lecion plej popol ne est believers
plej assuredly your Lord est Almighty Merciful
‘Aad disbelieved messengers
Their frat Hood dir al them vi ne est righteous
Mi est honest messenger vi
Vi reverence DI obe me
Mi ne pet vi por any wage my wage ven el Lord univers
Vi cxarpent cxiu hill mansion vanity's sake
Vi set buildings vi last forever
Kaj when vi strik vi strik mercilessly
Vi reverence DI obe me
Reverence Unu proviz vi all ajx vi kon
Li proviz vi livestock infan
Kaj gxarden kaj risort
Mi tim por vi retribution awesome tag
Ili dir est des sam vi predik ne predik
Ke affliction lim our ancestors
Ne retribution ever befall us
Ili tiel disbelieved consequently ni annihilated them. This est lecion plej popol ne est believers
plej assuredly your Lord est Almighty Merciful
Thamoud disbelieved messengers
Their frat Saaleh dir al them vi ne est righteous
Mi est honest messenger vi
Vi reverence DI obe me
Mi ne pet vi any wage my wage ven nur Lord univers
Vi supoz vi las forever secure en this sxtat
Vi gxu gxarden printemp
crops daktil palm delicious frukt
Vi carve mont luxurious mansions
Vi reverence DI obe me
Ne obe transgressors
Who commit evil ne bon works
Ili dir Vi sorcx
Vi est ne plur than human us. Produkt mirakl se vi est truthful
Li dir Here est kamel trink nur tag asign her; tag est different your specified tag de trink
Do ne tusx her any harm lest vi incur retribution awesome tag
Ili bucx her tiel incurred sorrow
retribution overwhelmed them. This est lecion plej popol ne est believers
plej assuredly your Lord est Almighty Merciful
Popol Lot disbelieved messengers
Their frat Lot dir al them vi ne est righteous
Mi est honest messenger vi
Vi reverence DI obe me
Mi ne pet vi any wage my wage ven nur Lord univers
Do vi hav seks vir all popol
Vi forsake wives your Lord kre vi! Ja vi transgressing popol
Ili dir vi refrain O Lot vi banished
Li dir mi deplore your actions
My Lord sav me my famili el their works
Ni sav him all his famili
Ne old woman; sxi doomed
Ni tiam detru others
Ni dusx them miserable dusx; ki terrible dusx those avert
This est lecion plej popol ne est believers
plej assuredly your Lord est Almighty Merciful
Popol Lign disbelieved messengers
Shu aib dir al them vi ne est righteous
Mi est honest messenger vi
Vi reverence DI obe me
Mi ne pet vi any wage my wage ven nur Lord univers
Vi don plen mezur when vi meti; do ne cheat
Vi pes equitable skal
Ne cheat popol their dekstr ne roam ter corruptingly
Reverence Unu kre vi previous generaci
Ili dir Vi sorcx
Vi est ne plur than human est us. En fakt, ni pens vi est liar
Let mes cxiel fal us vi est truthful
Li dir My Lord est Unu kon cxio vi do
Ili disbelieved him consequently ili incurred retribution Tag Canopy Gxi est retribution awesome tag
This est lecion plej popol ne est believers
plej assuredly your Lord est Almighty Merciful
This est revelation Lord univers
Honest Spirit (Gabriel) ven gxi
Al reveal gxi into your kor ke vi est 1 de warners
En perfekt Arabic lang
Gxi prophesied libr previous generaci
Gxi ne sufficient est sign them ke gxi est kon al scholars Infan Israel
Ni revealed this popol ne kon Arabic
Hav him recite gxi Arabic ili possibly ne kred en gxi
(Ni tiel render gxi like foreign idiom) kor kulp
Tiel ili ne kred en gxi; ne gxis ili seg painful retribution
Gxi ven them suddenly when ili malpli expect gxi
Ili tiam dir ni hav respite
Ili ne challenge our retribution
As vi seg ni allowed them gxu por jar
Tiam retribution ven them just as promes
Their vast rimed ne help them en des malplej
Ni neniam annihilate any community sen send warners
Do this est reminder ni est neniam unjust
Diabl neniam reveal this
Ili nek would nor could
Ili est prevent el auxd
Do ne idolize DI any ali di lest vi incur retribution
Vi predik popol est closest al vi
lower your wing believers sekv vi
Ili disobey vi tiam dir mi disown ki vi do
put your fid en Almighty Merciful
Who seg vi when vi medit nokt
your frequent prostrations
Li est Hearer Omniscient
Mi inform vi upon whom diabl descend
Ili descend cxiu kulp fabricator
Ili pretend auxskult plej de them est liars
As por poet ili sekv nur strayers
Vi ne seg their loyalty shifts situaci
Kaj ke ili dir ki ili ne do
Exempted est those kred plumb righteous life commemorate DI frequently bud their dekstr! Surely transgressors vol trov out ki their ultimate destiny est
These (liter) constitute proofs Quran; profound scripture
beacon bon news believers
Who observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat) ili est regard Hereafter absolutely nepr
Those ne kred en Hereafter ni ornam their works their okul. Tiel ili ad blunder
est these incur mav retribution Hereafter ili est mav losers
Surely vi ricev Quran el Sagx Omniscient
Recall ti Moses dir al his famili mi vid fajr; let me bring vi news therefrom torcx varm vi
When li ven gxi li est vok Ben est Unu parol fajr those around gxi Glory est DI Lord univers
O Moses this est Me DI Almighty Sagx
Jxet down your stab. When li seg gxi mov like demon li torn around fled O Moses ne est afraid. My messengers ne tim
those who commit transgression tiam substitute righteousness post pek; mi Forgiving Merciful
Put your man en your posx; gxi ven blank blemish These est among 9 mirakl al Pharaoh his popol por ili est wicked popol
When our mirakl prezent them klar profound ili dir This est obviously magic
Ili rejected them utterly konvink de their wrong voj their arrogance. Not consequences evildoers
Ni dot David Solomon knowledge ili dir Lauxd DI por ben us plur than many da His kred servants
Solomon est David's heir Li dir O popol ni dot kun kompren idiom bird all kinds da ajx bestowed us. This est ja efektiv ben
Mobilized service Solomon est his obedient soldat de jinns humans tro bird; all je his disposal
When ili approached val formik 1 formik dir O vi formik ir into your hejm lest vi get crushed Solomon his soldat sen perceiving
Li smiled rid her statement dir My Lord direct me est appreciative de blessings Vi bestowed me my parents do righteous works placx Vi! Admit me Your mercy kompani Your righteous servants
Li inspekt bird not mi ne seg hoopoe? Why li missing
Mi pun him severely ofer him li don me bon pretekst
Li ne wait long. (hoopoe) dir mi hav news ke vi ne hav. Mi brought vi Sheba kelk grav information
Mi trov woman regul them ben cxio posed tremendous palac
Mi trov her her popol prostrating sun DI! Diabl ornam their works their okul repulsed them path; consequently ili ne direkt
Ili prostrating DI Unu manifests all mister heavens ter 1 who kon cxio vi conceal cxio vi deklar
DI tie NE est ALI DI Him Lord great dominion
(Solomon) dir Ni seg vi told truth aux vi est liar
Pren this liter me don gxi them tiam watch their response
Sxi dir O my advisers mi ricev honorable liter
est Solomon gxi est DI Gracious Merciful
Proklam Do arrogant ven me as submitters
Sxi dir O my advisers konsil me en this materi! Mi ne decid anything vi advise me
Ili dir Ni posed potenc ni posed batal skills ultimate ordon est your man! Vi decid ki do
Sxi dir regx corrupt any land ili invad subjugate its dignified popol! This est ki ili usually do
Mi send gift them; seg ki messengers ven kun
When hoopoe returned Solomon (li told him news li respond Sheba's popol vi don me mon? Ki DI don me est far put than ki Li don vi. Vi est unu gxoj such gifts)
(Al hoopoe li dir) Ir them let them kon ti) ni ven them forces ili ne imag! Ni evict them humiliated debased
Li dir O vi elders de vi bring me her mansion antaux ili alven here submitters
afrit el jinns dir mi bring gxi vi vi bud Mi est powerful suficx do this

Unu posed knowledge libr dir mi bring gxi vi blink your okul. When li seg gxi sald him li dir This est ben my Lord whereby Li tests me montr mi est appreciative unappreciative. Whoever est appreciative est appreciative his own bon kaj se 1 turn unappreciative tiam my Lord est en ne bezon him Honorable
Li dir Remodel her mansion her. Seg sxi direkt ad kun des misguided
When sxi alven sxi pet Does your mansion jen this? Sxi dir seems this est gxi. (Solomon dir) Ni kon beforehand ki sxi do ni est jam submitters
Sxi diverted worshipping idols DI; sxi aparten al disbelieving popol

Sxi told Ir palac. When sxi seg its interior sxi pens est pool akv sxi tir her vest exposing her krur! Li dir This interior tuj paved kun crystal Sxi dir My Lord mi wronged my anim. Mi tuj submit Solomon DI Lord univers
Ni hav send al Thamoud their frat Saaleh dir Vi worship DI. ili torn into 2 feuding factions
Li dir O my popol vi hasten do commit evil bon works Nur vi implore DI forgiveness vi ating mercy
Ili dir Ni konsider vi mav omen us vi those joined vi. Li dir Your omen fully controlled DI. Ja vi est deviant popol
tie est 9 gangsters urb est wicked neniam did anything bon
Ili dir jxur DI ni kill him his popol tiam tell his gent ‘Ni kon nothing their death! Ni est truthful
Ili plotted schemed ni ankaux plotted schemed while ili ne perceive
Not consequences their plotting ni annihilated them all their popol
Here est their hejm utterly ruin their transgression! This est lecion popol kon
Ni sav those kred plumb righteous life
Lot dir al his popol Kiel vi commit such abomen publicly while vi seg
Vi practice seks hom lustfully women Ja vi est ignorant popol
